artist: Kobayashi Kiyochika; Author: Nishimori Takeki; Publisher: Matsuki Heikichi
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Long Live Japan, One Hundred Selections, One Hundred Laughs (Nippon banzai, hyakusen hyakushō 日本萬歳　百撰百笑)
text: A variation of this was published in the magazine Gunji gahō, April 20, 1904.
title: Excavating a Suffering Russian Bear
